levels.description: Start learning Russian with the basics of grammar, vocabulary, and pronunciation.
Build upon basic knowledge to improve understanding and communication.
Build confidence in Russian communication through practical conversation with native speakers.
Enhance fluency and comprehension in various contexts.
Develop advanced Russian fluency for academic, professional, or cultural purposes.
Achieve full mastery of Russian with native-level speaking, writing, and comprehension.
Learn essential English grammar and vocabulary for everyday situations.
Build upon basic knowledge to improve understanding and communication.
Improve fluency and accuracy in English through interactive practice.
Enhance communication skills for various contexts.
Develop strong academic and professional English communication skills.
Reach native-like English proficiency for any context.
Learn basic Spanish vocabulary and grammar for everyday conversations.
Build upon basic knowledge to improve understanding and communication.
Strengthen Spanish communication skills and cultural understanding.
Enhance fluency in various contexts.
Achieve advanced Spanish fluency for studies, work, and travel.
Master Spanish at a native level, both spoken and written.
Learn essential French vocabulary, grammar, and pronunciation.
Build upon basic knowledge to improve understanding and communication.
Practice French conversations with native speakers.
Enhance fluency in various contexts.
Develop advanced fluency for professional and academic contexts.
Master French to communicate like a native speaker.
Learn German basics for everyday communication.
Build upon basic knowledge to improve understanding and communication.
Develop German fluency for work and travel.
Enhance fluency in various contexts.
Enhance German proficiency for academic and professional contexts.
Achieve near-native mastery of German.
Learn the basics of Italian grammar, vocabulary, and pronunciation.

Practice Italian in real-life situations with native speakers.
Enhance fluency in various contexts.
Achieve advanced fluency in Italian communication.
Master Italian with full native-like proficiency.
Learn the basics of Japanese writing, speaking, and listening.

Enhance fluency in various contexts.
Achieve advanced fluency in Japanese for business and academics.
Master Japanese for complete native-level proficiency.
